title: 7 things you didn't realize your phone can do
description: Your phone is capable of a lot more than you use it for every day. Some of its best features might not be obvious, so we've rounded them up for you.

title: I just watched the future of supermarket shopping and I may run to the hills
description: Is this really what customers want? Well, it's what retailers want, apparently.

title: The $160 gadget that wants you to do something you may never have considered
description: People do this? People actually want to do this? Apparently.
